    • watermarkColumn

      public IcebergSource.Builder<T> watermarkColumn(String columnName)
      Emits watermarks once per split based on the min value of column statistics from files metadata in the given split. The generated watermarks are also used for ordering the splits for read. Accepted column types are timestamp/timestamptz/long. For long columns consider setting watermarkColumnTimeUnit(TimeUnit).

      Consider setting `read.split.open-file-cost` to prevent combining small files to a single split when the watermark is used for watermark alignment.

    • watermarkColumnTimeUnit

      public IcebergSource.Builder<T> watermarkColumnTimeUnit(TimeUnit timeUnit)
      When the type of the watermarkColumn(java.lang.String) is Types.LongType, then sets the TimeUnit to convert the value. The default value is TimeUnit.MICROSECONDS.

    • properties

      @Deprecated public IcebergSource.Builder<T> properties(Map<String,String> properties)
      Deprecated.
      Use setAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>) instead.

      public IcebergSource<T> build()
